subject: AI & Agents
title: Neural Style Transfer: Painting Like Picasso
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Neural Style Transfer: Painting Like Picasso.

hook.text: Upload your photo and a Picasso painting. AI repaints your photo in Picasso's style. Instantly.

buildup.text: Neural style transfer separates content from style using deep convolutional network features.

discovery.text: Content lives in higher layers. Style lives in correlations between lower layers. They're separable.

twist.text: The 2015 paper launched a wave of art apps. Prisma got 70 million downloads in its first year.

climax.text: Style transfer proved that neural networks learn meaningful artistic representations, not just pixel patterns.

punchline.text: Content is what you say. Style is how. AI remixes both.

quiz.question: How does neural style transfer work?
options: It separates content and style into different network layers and recombines them
It manually edits each pixel to match an art style
It uses pre-made image filters like Instagram
